description: Chesnaught (ブリガロン), known as the Spiny Armor Pokémon, is the final evolved form of Chespin. With its new Fighting type, it defends its friends and allies by putting its own life in danger. Its armoring allows it to endure powerful explosions. It can learn Spiky Shield to defend itself and possibly cause the opponent`s attack to backfire.
name: Brigarron
